Html:
Sundial of the Exiled is a caster dps trinket offering 84 crit and a proc for 590 spellpower.  It looks to me like Rawr is valuing only the 84 crit, although it does have the 10% proc for 590 spellpower in its item table.

For now as a rough estimate I'm just going to guess it's good for 10 seconds out 60, so equivalent to ~98 spellpower.  Or is there a better way for me to handle this?
Procs have to be handled by individual models. Most likely whatever model you're using doesn't support this proc yet.

The best way, until the model you are using is updated, is to just edit it by hand and add 98.2 spell power.  (That's what I came up with anyway.)

What model are you using?

(Based on your past posts I think you are a Shadow Priest.  I'm getting together a list of all the trinkets that we might use to see if they are being properly handled.  Once that is done we can start adding support for the ones with new or unusual effects.)
Thanks Tarix.  Yes, I'm a shadow priest.  Manual edit approach seems to be working fine for now.
This has been added by TNSe and will appear in the next version.

I have another couple of items that could be added to the next update -

Chuchu's Tiny Box of Horrors, looksÂ like it should be ranked for feral DPSing

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=43838

Futuresight Rune, for druid healing

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=38763

Could these also be included please?
